Package ver14.SharedClasses.Game.Moves

Class Move

java.lang.Object
ver14.SharedClasses.Game.Moves.BasicMove
ver14.SharedClasses.Game.Moves.Move
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Move>
public class Move extends BasicMove implements Comparable<Move>
Move - represents a "heavy" move. with a lot of info.
Author:
Bezalel Avrahami (bezalel3250@gmail.com)

    • guessEval

      private double guessEval()
      Guess eval double. used to estimate how good (or bad) a move can be, in order to sort the moves before making any of them, in some situations in the minimax

      the double
